name: The Great Canadian Landscaping Company Ltd.

owner.name: The Great Canadian Landscaping Company Ltd. (Owner)

address: The Great Canadian Landscaping Company Ltd., 118 Garden Ave, North Vancouver, BC V7P 3H2

featured_reviews.review_id: We have worked with The Great Canadian Landscaping Company on a few projects through out the years. Recently they took on the Landscaping portion of a Coach House project in North Vancouver for us. The team did an amazing job from design, site prep, concrete work, fence installation, paving, planting, lighting, irrigation and more. We worked with Chris and Peter on the project and would not hesitate to hire them again. Thanks!
featured_reviews.review_text: We have worked with The Great Canadian Landscaping Company on a few projects through out the years. Recently they took on the Landscaping portion of a Coach House project in North Vancouver for us. The team did an amazing job from design, site prep, concrete work, fence installation, paving, planting, lighting, irrigation and more. We worked with Chris and Peter on the project and would not hesitate to hire them again. Thanks!
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Thanks Karim and Kaveh. We love working with Goldcon and your clients. As always, cannot wait for the next project to partner with you both on.

Chris

featured_reviews.review_id: Just had a few fence panels replaced.  The gents that did the work were courteous, efficient and diligent.  On time and they nicely cleaned up after themselves.Very happy with the job done.
featured_reviews.review_text: Just had a few fence panels replaced.  The gents that did the work were courteous, efficient and diligent.  On time and they nicely cleaned up after themselves.Very happy with the job done.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Al,

Thank you for the kind words for out crew! We appreciate it a lot!

Chris

featured_reviews.review_id: I would very much like to thank everyone at The Great Canadian Landscaping Company who made the effort to reduce the noise of the equipment used to do the landscaping this summer at my building on West 7th Avenue in Vancouver.  I very much appreciate your sensitivity to this issue.  Yours truly, R. Massey
featured_reviews.review_text: I would very much like to thank everyone at The Great Canadian Landscaping Company who made the effort to reduce the noise of the equipment used to do the landscaping this summer at my building on West 7th Avenue in Vancouver.  I very much appreciate your sensitivity to this issue.  Yours truly, R. Massey
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hi Robin,

Thank you for your kind message and review! It is much appreciated! We will let the team know!

Chris

featured_reviews.review_id: The best landscaping company on the North Shore! With many experienced people working within the team they will not disappoint. From regular maintenance to keeping your gardens looking good all year round, to big garden clean ups & installations they're the best for all your landscaping needs.
featured_reviews.review_text: The best landscaping company on the North Shore! With many experienced people working within the team they will not disappoint. From regular maintenance to keeping your gardens looking good all year round, to big garden clean ups & installations they're the best for all your landscaping needs.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Lindsay! Appreciate the kind comments! Its all about the people that work here and they are what make our company so amazing!

featured_reviews.review_id: It's currently snowing outside, and coming down like crazy. But thanks to Great Canadian Landscaping, our sidewalks are clean and free of any ice. I was impressed with their friendliness, and how thorough they are, they've done a great job. A few days ago, I went out first thing in the morning, and, despite the overnight snow, sidewalks had been already cleaned.
featured_reviews.review_text: It's currently snowing outside, and coming down like crazy. But thanks to Great Canadian Landscaping, our sidewalks are clean and free of any ice. I was impressed with their friendliness, and how thorough they are, they've done a great job. A few days ago, I went out first thing in the morning, and, despite the overnight snow, sidewalks had been already cleaned.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Carmen,

Thank you so much for the comment and positive feedback! It's The Great Canadian Way! S(no)w worries now for you and your fellow residents! Happy Holidays!

Chris

featured_reviews.review_id: The Great Canadian Landscaping company did a moderate-sized backyard reno and design for us in October and November. They did a fantastic job and showed up every day until the job was completed, on time and on budget. Stephane and the rest of the crew were a pleasure to work with, and were very meticulous about all details, and had some great suggestions. The backyard looks amazing, and they left the worksite spotless. Can't wait for summer to enjoy it! We highly recommend this company and will definitely use them again!
featured_reviews.review_text: The Great Canadian Landscaping company did a moderate-sized backyard reno and design for us in October and November. They did a fantastic job and showed up every day until the job was completed, on time and on budget. Stephane and the rest of the crew were a pleasure to work with, and were very meticulous about all details, and had some great suggestions. The backyard looks amazing, and they left the worksite spotless. Can't wait for summer to enjoy it! We highly recommend this company and will definitely use them again!
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hi Rob,

Thanks very much for your review and kind words. We are glad you are happy with the work and look forward to helping you again if the need comes up.

Chris

featured_reviews.review_id: We have been using GCLC (Great Canadian Landscaping) for a year for our Strata's landscaping and we started using them for Snow removal this year (2019-2020). Our previous company over salted and killed a number of our garden plants as well as an expensive hedge. As well their attention to snow clearing was lacking at best. I was constantly out clearing our walkways and the city sidewalks that where our legal responsibility. GCLC uses IceMelt, a pet safe product, and a much more careful and thoughtful application that seems to not affect our plants as much, AND the "gold star", the snow clearing is down to the concrete. Our sidewalks are clearer than our neighbours! The areas around entrances, recycling and garbage areas are thoroughly cleared making me worry less for my older neighbours whom the slippery conditions are a hazard. Thank you GCLC! Wendral Court Strata North Vancouver
featured_reviews.review_text: We have been using GCLC (Great Canadian Landscaping) for a year for our Strata's landscaping and we started using them for Snow removal this year (2019-2020). GCLC uses IceMelt, a pet safe product, and a much more careful and thoughtful application that seems to not affect our plants as much, AND the "gold star", the snow clearing is down to the concrete. Wendral Court Strata North Vancouver
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Mark for your glowing review! We appreciate comments like this and look forward to continue servicing your Strata property for years to come.

featured_reviews.review_id: Great Canadian is very good. They design, install and maintain your yard perfectly . A one stop amazing experience . Locally owned and operated and always give me great service and great advice .
featured_reviews.review_text: Great Canadian is very good. They design, install and maintain your yard perfectly . A one stop amazing experience . Locally owned and operated and always give me great service and great advice .
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Grant,

Thank you for your review. It means a lot to our team to hear how much you appreciate our services and the experience you have received. We look forward to continuing to service your property for years to come.

Chris & Team GR8CDN
